title: Admitted Students  |  Admission & Aid  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Admitted Students Congratulations on your acceptance to DePaul! Next Steps for Incoming Students Now that you’ve been admitted, there are important steps that you need to take before you start your first quarter. Select your student type below for your Next Steps Checklist and complete the enrollment process. (Graduate students will be contacted by program-specific staff.) Freshman Next Steps Transfer/Adult Student Next Steps International Student Next Steps Plan a Visit Take a look at our Admitted Student Events pageto learn about upcoming tours, receptions, and more. Student Blogs Wonder what it’s like to be a DePaul student? Read our student DeBlogs. Counselor Finder Looking for help in your area? Find your Freshman or Transfer/Adult Admission Counselor.
